8830.quoteText:
Will you share my information?

No.

We will only disclose your information
8830.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

8831.quoteText:
Can I delete my information?

Yes.

You can delete your sync account by contacting us via support@pocketcasts.com
After complying with your request all your data will be deleted and you will no longer be able to sign into your account.
8831.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

8832.quoteText:
Can I have a copy of my information?

Yes.

You can request a copy of the data we have stored about you by contacting us via support@pocketcasts.com.
8832.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

8833.quoteText:
the new Privacy Policy.

Effective Date: 18 September 2019
8833.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

8834.quoteText: We may need to update this Policy to reflect changes in the Service, our business and applicable laws.
8834.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

8835.quoteText:
Why do you collect information about me?

To provide the Service to you;

To provide effective support to you during your use of the Service;

To secure your account against unauthorised access;

To aggregate subscription data to generate the charts displayed in the Discover section, for the benefit of the Pocket Casts community.
8835.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

8836.quoteText:
What information do you collect about me?

If you choose to create an account in our app, we store:

  • Your username in the form of an email address, and password;
  • Your podcast subscriptions, playlists, episode filters, episode data and settings configuration;
  • Your device language;
  • A count of failed sign in attempts for your account;
  • The date and time you last synced with our server.
8836.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

8837.quoteText: If you choose not to create an account, and don’t use push notifications, no data is stored about you on our servers.
8837.title: No need to register

8838.quoteDoc: Terms of Use – Pocket Casts Plus
8838.quoteText: If you purchase an auto-recurring periodic subscription through an in-app purchase, you will continue to be billed for the subscription until you cancel.
8838.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
